item.description:
Myles Standish State Forest needs some bodies for National Trails Day, June 5. In addition to the Bentley Loop, we will be rescuing a trail from Federal Pond Road to Howland Road. This trail is very grown in and needs major opening up to be multi-user. Bob Bentley and Thom Gifford will be leading group to assist with trail maintenance and improvmements in the park. There are 3 hills where we want to put water bars &/or steps, some brushing, signage and weed whacking. Work time is estimated to be from 9:30 - 1:30.

A lunch will be provided but attendees should bring their own water and snacks.
Meeting place is at Park Headquarters.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: National Trails Day
